meanings.definition: Infested with or characteristic of vermin.
meanings.sent1: The old barn was so verminous that the farmer had to call the exterminator.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house had a verminous smell that made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent3: The verminous mice in the attic were throwing a party, complete with tiny hats and streamers.
meanings.sent4: The verminous thoughts in his mind gnawed away at his peace like hungry rats.
meanings.sent5: The verminous infestation in the basement was a horror movie come to life.

meanings.sent1: The criminal's verminous actions left a trail of destruction in their wake.
meanings.sent2: Her verminous behavior towards her classmates made her very unpopular.
meanings.sent3: The verminous villain twirled his mustache and cackled evilly.
meanings.sent4: The verminous lies he spread were like poison, infecting the minds of all who heard them.
meanings.sent5: The verminous betrayal cut deeper than any knife, leaving scars that would never heal.
